overview:
Connie Hammond is a digital media executive offering 20+ years of extensive experience in the following areas: Multi Channel Market Strategy; Content Development & Monetization; Website Analysis including UX & UI Design; Competitive Analysis; Social Media Marketing; Community Building; New Business Development; Enterprise Sales; Marketing & Brand Management.

Currently, Connie owns and operates Sharing Profiles, a self-funded network of resort-based websites including, ResortLocals.com, ResortWorkers.com (started out as HireMeAspen.com), ResortPix.com and ResortRenters.com (coming soon).

Other entrepreneurial attributes include envisioning â€“ then building â€“ a community of resort locals from scratch, creating a partner program that benefits that community, managing an ambassador program that results in evangelizing our message, fine-tuning the business model, and overseeing social media, marketing, publicity and advertising.

During her prior role as Director of Media Sales at News Corp / Dow Jones / CBS MarketWatch, she licensed content, data and technology to large public-facing media and corporate websites.

She won the 2007 Pinnacle Award for top licensing sales worldwide.
